sources.title: Jungle Girl 1941 colorized serial (Frances Gifford)
sources.description: Dr. John Meredith, ashamed at the criminal activities of his twin brother Bradley, travels with his infant daughter to Africa. There his skills as a doctor displace Shamba, the resident witch doctor of the Masamba. Years later, Slick Latimer and Bradley Meredith arrive looking for a diamond mine, and Bradley kills his brother and takes his place. The disgruntled Shamba teams up with them and attempts to kill Nyoka, Meredith's now-grown-up daughter, to obtain the amulet he believes is the secret of Dr. Meredith's power to cure the natives' ills. But good guys Jack Stanton and Curly Rogers have also arrived, and join Nyoka in trying to stop the villains. 15-chapter cliffhanger serial. Frances Gifford as Nyoka Meredith Tom Neal as Jack Stanton Trevor Bardette as Dr. John Meredith / Bradley Meredith Gerald Mohr as Slick Latimer Eddie Acuff as Curly Rogers Frank Lackteen as Shamba Tommy Cook as Kimbu Robert Barron as Bombo If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
